nodes.text: Forta Gair  was a female Human Exarch of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. She commanded the Star Fortress above Belsavis until 3631 BBY, when the Commander of the Anti-Zakuul Alliance boarded the Star Fortress and killed her, overloading the Sun Generator and destroying the entire battlestation in process.
Forta Gair appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the final boss of the Belsavis Star Fortress.
